entrypoint: const http=require('http');const s=http.createServer((q,r)=>{let b='';q.on('data',c=>b+=c);q.on('end',()=>{r.writeHead(200,{'Content-Type':'application/json'});r.end(JSON.stringify({method:q.method,url:q.url,headers:q.headers,body:b}))})});s.listen(8080,()=>console.log('Echo server listening on :8080'))
